comments:
To repro:
1.  Create new Enterprise Application Project
3.  Right click on Enterprise App project and select Properties
4.  Expand the J2EE Module Dependencies in the tree on the left
5.  Select Web Library page from that group --> you should get a message that
that page can only be displayed for web projects
6.  Select the EAR Module page from that group --> click OK on the property dialog

Results:  error occurs, see log file for more info.  This is the stack track in
the log:

Fixed by 109152

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 109152 ***
Verified this is no longer even possible in 1.5 since the J2EE modules prop page is not exandable in the tree.  And that page for EAR projects is populated and, even better, not throwing any NPEs  ;)
